name: faraday-sdk
description: TypeScript client SDK for the Faraday API

scripts.generate: rimraf ./src/gen && openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-fetch -i openapi/openapi.json -o src/gen --skip-validate-spec --additional-properties npmName=faraday-sdk,npmVersion=$npm_package_version,typescriptThreePlus=true,supportsES6=true,useUnionTypes=true,useSingleRequestParameter=true,modelPropertyNaming=original,enumPropertyNaming=original
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run generate && npm run build
